mapper.insert: insert into live(identifier, name, cover, status, push_add, pull_add, video, create_uid, create_name, create_avatar) values (#{identifier}, #{name}, #{cover}, #{status}, #{pushAdd}, #{pullAdd}, #{video}, #{createUid}, #{createName}, #{createAvatar})
mapper.update: update live set participants = #{online} where is_deleted = 0 and identifier = #{identifier}
update live set is_deleted = 1, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select from live
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and is_deleted = 0
order by create_time desc
select from live where is_deleted = 0 and create_uid = #{userId}
select from live where is_deleted = 0 and id = #{id}
